page.title: 11Farming in the Corvedale
page.content:
Corvedale is a very fertile valley. The average size of farm is 280 acres. The farming is mainly{mixed}with{beef cattle,{sheep}and 3{dairy}farms. Wheat and barley are the main{cereal crops and a very large acreage of grass is cut for{silage}which is taking over from hay. Oil seed rape is a crop which is becoming more popular in the Corvedale.
11 children in our class live on farms. The busiest time of the year for the children is Spring and Summer. Only one farm has no corn and one farm has just sheep.
2 farms have no employees, 4 farms have 1, 2 farms have 2 and 1 farm has 4 employees. The ground around here is hilly.
